lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Smith Kline also said its small clinical laboratory testing unit, with 1986 sales of 373 mln dlrs, performs 24 mln tests a year, and sees increases in employee drug testing as well as in testing for the AIDS antibody.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: To bolster its position in the antiulcer market, in which Tagamet has met stiff competition, SmithKline said its strategy to develop an over-the-counter version of Tagamet is bolstered by two joint ventures, one with <Wellcome PLC>, and one pending venture in Japan.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: SmithKline, whose major product is the antiulcer medication Tagamet, said in the report that it intends to improve earnings from existing products, expand its product portfolio and optimize its financial resources.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Smith Kline also said its small clinical laboratory testing unit, with 1986 sales of 373 mln dlrs, performs 24 mln tests a year, and sees increases in employee drug testing as well as in testing for the AIDS antibody.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: To bolster its position in the antiulcer market, in which Tagamet has met stiff competition, SmithKline said its strategy to develop an over-the-counter version of Tagamet is bolstered by two joint ventures, one with <Wellcome PLC>, and one pending venture in Japan.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: SmithKline, whose major product is the antiulcer medication Tagamet, said in the report that it intends to improve earnings from existing products, expand its product portfolio and optimize its financial resources.
